mapper.select: SELECT p.api as permission_url, GROUP_CONCAT(r.mname) as role_names FROM permissions p LEFT JOIN role_permission rp ON p.id = rp.permission_id LEFT JOIN roles r ON rp.role_id = r.id where r.enable = 1 GROUP BY p.api
SELECT user_name from sys_user left join user_role ur on sys_user.id = ur.user_id WHERE ur.role_id = (SELECT id FROM roles WHERE nick_name = #{roleName})
